abilityEffect.en: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Typhlosion is your Active Pokémon, you may move 1 damage counter from either player's Pokémon to another Pokémon (yours or your opponent's). This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: If Typhlosion has at least 2 [R] Energy attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
